about: Physics Wallah is an Indian ed-tech platform offering a wide range of online and offline/hybrid coaching for school students, professional/competitive-exam aspirants, government-job aspirants and more. PW combines live & recorded lectures, test series, study material, offline centres (Vidyapeeth), mocks and flexibility to cover many exams and courses. Their goal is to make education affordable and accessible across India. https://www.pw.live/ :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
offerings: Online & offline coaching for school classes (6th–12th)
Competitive exam coaching: JEE, NEET, CUET, IIT-JAM, GATE
Government exam / job exam coaching: SSC, Bank, AE/JE (Civil, EEE/ECE/Mechanical etc.), State PSC, UPSC, Defence (NDA, CDS, Agniveer), Railway JE, PSU-entrance etc.
Professional / career-oriented exam coaching: CA, CS, ACCA, UGC-NET / CSIR-NET, MBA entrance, other commerce / professional courses
Teaching-exam coaching: TET / CTET / State TETs / Teaching eligibility exams
Test series, mocks, sample papers, NCERT solutions, previous-year papers, study-material & recorded lectures
Offline / hybrid coaching via Vidyapeeth / coaching centres in many cities
Scholarship / foundation batches / discounted registration / batch-based admission
courses_listed: Class 8 / Class 9 / Class 10 / Class 11 / Class 12 (foundation / board / entrance prep)
AE / JE (Civil / Mechanical / Electrical / ECE / EEE / Computer / etc.) & PSU-entrance
State PSC exams (various state public service commission exams)
Defence-exam coaching: NDA, CDS, Agniveer, SSB prep
Teaching-exam coaching: TET / CTET / state teaching eligibility tests
Commerce / professional courses: CA, CS (Company Secretary), ACCA, UGC-NET / CSIR-NET, MBA entrance
Other exams / entrance exams / competitive exams / vocational / professional courses

FAQ.question: What types of courses does Physics Wallah offer?
FAQ.answer: PW offers school-level coaching (classes 6–12), entrance exam prep (JEE, NEET, CUET, IIT-JAM, GATE), government / job-exam coaching (SSC, Bank, AE/JE, State PSC, UPSC, Defence, Railway JE, PSU-entrance), teaching-exam coaching (TET/CTET), professional/commerce courses (CA, CS, ACCA, UGC-NET/CSIR-NET, MBA entrance), along with test-series, mocks, study-material and offline/hybrid classes via their Vidyapeeth centres. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

FAQ.question: Does Physics Wallah provide online as well as offline or hybrid classes?
FAQ.answer: Yes. PW offers both online coaching batches and offline/hybrid classes through its Vidyapeeth centres across India. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

FAQ.question: Do they offer engineering-branch job / AE/JE / SSC-JE / Railway-JE / PSU-entrance coaching?
FAQ.answer: Yes. PW lists AE & JE (Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, ECE, Computer etc.) online coaching for SSC JE, RRB JE, PSU-related exams, and other engineering-branch job exams. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

FAQ.question: What about commerce / professional courses like CA, CS, ACCA, or postgraduate entrance exams / UGC-NET?
FAQ.answer: PW lists courses for CA, CS (Company Secretary), ACCA, UGC-NET / CSIR-NET in its catalogue. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

FAQ.question: Is there support for school-board exams and classes from 6th to 12th?
FAQ.answer: Yes. PW provides online and offline coaching for classes 6th to 12th, for school-board syllabus, along with foundation courses for lower classes. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

FAQ.question: What about test-series, mocks, sample papers and study materials?
FAQ.answer: PW offers study materials, sample papers, previous-year papers, mocks, test-series, live/recorded lectures and 24×7 doubt-solving support for many courses. :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}

FAQ.question: How affordable are the courses / what’s the fee / registration cost?
FAQ.answer: According to PW’s published fee-structure: many online / foundation / test-series courses start from modest amounts (e.g. some batches show price ₹999–₹3,999 or with discounts). Offline or full Vidyapeeth courses have higher fees depending on course duration and batch type. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

notes.fee_variability: Fees and exact batch-availability vary depending on course type (online / offline), subject/exam, branch (for engineering/job exams), discount offers, and batch start date — user should be asked for exact exam/branch before quoting fee.
notes.course_catalogue_dynamic: PW’s catalogue is wide and evolving; some courses (especially professional/entrance) may have limited or periodic batches; always verify availability before confirming to user.
